philadelphia_roll.name: Philadelphia Classic

dragon_roll.description: Eel, cucumber, topped with avocado and unagi sauce.

tempura_shrimp_roll.description: Crispy shrimp tempura, cucumber, and spicy mayo.

miso_soup.description: Traditional soup with tofu, wakame, and green onions.

teriyaki_chicken.name: Chicken Teriyaki
teriyaki_chicken.description: Grilled chicken with teriyaki sauce and steamed rice.

beef_udon.name: Beef Udon
beef_udon.description: Thick wheat noodles with tender beef and vegetables.

lunch_basic.description: Miso soup, California roll, and green tea.

lunch_premium.description: Miso soup, Philadelphia roll, 3 nigiri, and green tea.
